title: Greg Macfarlane
text:
I am an assistant professor of Civil Engineering at Brigham Young University. My research involves the development and application of travel demand forecasting models, including the implementation of emerging third-party datasets as well as modeling practice.
I teach courses on sustainability, transportation engineering, transport modeling, and traffic simulation.
Download my CV here
